Fixed>HEAD: 20061215

I found and fixed the IndexOutOfBoundsException.  I've tested on both Linux/GTK and on Windows XP and have no more of these reported issues.

Note that Snippet 1 hasn't hooked up the editing features yet.  Snippet 2 does that.  So the editing bugs you're reporting here are just because Snippet 1 doesn't support editing yet.

I think this should get you running again.  Please let me know if you still have issues.
